document_data.mainbody:
Downunder the Living City is a one-round tournament adventure module set in the Living City organized play program. It debuted at Gen Con 91, was reprinted a year later in Polyhedron #77 with minor changes, and reprinted again in 1998 as part of the Adventurers Guild organized play program.
Index based on the original tournament edition.
Moonwind
Only things exclusive to the Adventurers Guild edition are indexed here.
Only things exclusive to the Polyhedron edition are indexed here.
